Articles.Content:
We all know that Orbiter has a flight record/replay system that allows for cinematics to be made easily - you just record your flight, and then you replay it - the ship does everything it did during the flight, including firing engines, opening and closing cargo bays, deploying solar panels and landing gear, but you can freely move the camera to make your cinematic. It is basically a 3D movie/animation or a "magic autopilot" that repeats every recorded action.

 

Is there any equivalent for this in KSP? If not, please make one!

 

It should replay all animations, including the firing of engines, all animated parts, EVA's, etc...
